questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Food and dining
D) Art and culture

A) A sports event
B) A cooking class
C) A dining experience
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A landscape
B) A group of people
C) A dish of food
D) An art piece

B) A person
C) Two dishes of food
D) A painting

A) Mountains
B) The ocean
C) A white tablecloth with other dining items
D) A bookshelf

A) A road

C) A knife
